Package org.omnifaces.renderer

Class CriticalStylesheetRenderer

java.lang.Object
jakarta.faces.render.Renderer<CriticalStylesheet>
org.omnifaces.renderer.CriticalStylesheetRenderer
public class CriticalStylesheetRenderer extends Renderer<CriticalStylesheet>
This renderer is the default renderer of CriticalStylesheet.
Since:
4.5
Author:
Bauke Scholtz

  • Method Details

    • encodeBegin

      public void encodeBegin(FacesContext context, CriticalStylesheet component) throws IOException
      Writes a <link rel="preload" as="style"> element with a href attribute representing Resource.getRequestPath(). If the resource is not resolvable, then a RES_NOT_FOUND will be written to the href attribute instead.
      Overrides:
      encodeBegin in class Renderer<CriticalStylesheet>
      Throws:
      IOException

    • encodeEnd

      public void encodeEnd(FacesContext context, CriticalStylesheet component) throws IOException
      Ends the <link> and writes a <noscript> with a "plain vanilla" <link rel="stylesheet">
      Overrides:
      encodeEnd in class Renderer<CriticalStylesheet>
      Throws:
      IOException
